scripts._comment: Not sure that clean-reports below will work on Windows
scripts.clean-reports-and-downloads: rm -R -f cypress/reports && rm -R -f cypress/downloads && mkdir cypress/reports && mkdir cypress/downloads
scripts._comment2: Run sauce demo manually from GitHub Actions workflow
scripts.ready-to-test: npm run clean-reports-and-downloads && npx cypress run --browser chrome --spec ./cypress/tests/ready-to-test-github-page/readyToTestSmoke.cy.js
scripts.orange-demo: npm run clean-reports-and-downloads && npx cypress run --browser chrome --spec ./cypress/tests/orange-demo-site/orangeDemoSmoke.cy.js
scripts.lambda-test-demo: npm run clean-reports-and-downloads && npx cypress run --browser chrome --spec ./cypress/tests/lambda-test-demo-site/lambdaTestDemoRegistration.cy.js
